sn55.35:1.1: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, devānaṃ devapadāni avisuddhānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhiyā apariyodātānaṃ sattānaṃ pariyodapanāya.
sn55.35:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.35:2.3: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.35:2.8: Na ca kho panāhaṃ kiñci byābādhemi tasaṃ vā thāvaraṃ vā.
sn55.35:2.10: Idaṃ paṭhamaṃ devānaṃ devapadaṃ avisuddhānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhiyā apariyodātānaṃ sattānaṃ pariyodapanāya.
sn55.35:4.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi …pe… samādhisaṃvattanikehi.
sn55.35:4.6: Na kho panāhaṃ kiñci byābādhemi tasaṃ vā thāvaraṃ vā.
sn55.35:4.8: Idaṃ catutthaṃ devānaṃ devapadaṃ avisuddhānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhiyā apariyodātānaṃ sattānaṃ pariyodapanāya.
sn55.35:4.9: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri devānaṃ devapadāni avisuddhānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhiyā apariyodātānaṃ sattānaṃ pariyodapanāyā”ti.
